instruction: Generate an email reply to the sender.
input:
Dear Mr Smith,

Thank you for your interest in our company and we hope to work with you soon.

Best regards,

The XYZ Team
output:
Dear Mr Smith, 

Thank you for taking the time to reach out, we appreciate your interest in our company. We look forward to working together soon and we will be in touch with more information.

Best regards,

The XYZ Team
